trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_SEQ_00<tab>Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan wishes to assign you your first task as a conjurer of Stillglade Fane.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_SEQ_01<tab>Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan bids you aid in the Twelveswood's recovery by purging it of three squirrels, three ladybugs, and three funguars.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_SEQ_02<tab>You have succeeded in slaying the specified creatures. Report back to Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan at the Conjurers' Guild.

TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_SEQ_03<tab>Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan explains that conjurers harness the power of nature in order to bring about change. Thus enlightened, you set out to accustom yourself to being at one with the forces that surround you.
※The next conjurer quest will be available from E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan upon reaching level 5.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_TODO_00<tab>Slay ground squirrels as a conjurer.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_TODO_01<tab>Slay little ladybugs as a conjurer.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_TODO_02<tab>Slay forest funguars as a conjurer.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_TODO_03<tab>Report to Brother E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan at the Conjurers' Guild.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_1<tab>The part of conjurer becomes you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_2<tab>Without further ado, I shall assign you your first task as a conjurer of Stillglade Fane.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_3<tab>Just beyond the city gates, you will encounter squirrels, ladybugs, and funguars. I would have you slay three of each.

TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_4<tab>Lest you wonder how I can so coolly order the taking of life, know that things are not as they once were. As a consequence of the Calamity─and, I may add, through no fault of their own─these creatures have become a burden to the Twelveswood. A burden it cannot well bear.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_5<tab>As a conjurer, it is your duty to carry out the will of the forest. And by employing your powers in so doing, you will come to learn something of your art.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_6<tab>Go now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and perform your first task in the name of the elementals.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_10<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The elementals have told me of your success.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_11<tab>By placing yourself in the midst of nature and seeing it with a conjurer's eyes, you have taken your first step along the path to enlightenment.

TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_12<tab>Healing, protection, and destruction... Though our spells vary in function, they all derive their power from the same source─the forces embodied in all creation.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_13<tab>By gaining a true understanding of these, a conjurer may call upon them to manipulate his environment, thereby realizing the state of being that he desires.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_14<tab>Ah, yes...yours is a familiar look: the very picture of confusion! Be not disheartened, for comprehension shall come in due time.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_15<tab>For now, you must learn to reach out to the forces embodied in each of us. Pray hearken to mine instructions.

TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_16<tab>Breathe deep and open your eyes to that which cannot be seen. Feel the myriad life around you, and draw upon this boundless reservoir of energy. Take up your cane, and use it to lend that energy form.

TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_ESUMIYAN_000_17<tab>Go forth, my young conjurer, and be at one with the world. Return to me when you have learned to draw upon the forces around you with the selfsame ease you draw upon those within.
TEXT_CLSCNJ100_00211_SYSTEM_000_20<tab>The next conjurer quest will be available from E<var 1F /var>Sumi<var 1F /var>Yan upon reaching level 5.
